channel.title: CD on Reside-IC
channel.description: Recent content in CD on Reside-IC

item.title: Continuous Delivery with Buildkite
item.description: Introduction Our deployments at RESIDE typically consist of a bash script or a python script using constellation to bring up a set of docker containers each of which contains a separate part of the application. We might have one docker image for the web app, one for the database, one for redis, one for an R backend API, and multiple workers. We use Buildkite as part of our CI (continuous integration) process to build these images and test them.
